parameters.description: Y coordinate of first end point, in meters

title: ISketchManager.CreateCenterLine
description: Creates a center line between the specified points.
signature:
SketchSegment CreateCenterLine( 
   System.Double
X1
,
   System.Double
Y1
,
   System.Double
Z1
,
   System.Double
X2
,
   System.Double
Y2
,
   System.Double
Z2
)

parameters.name: X1
parameters.description: X coordinate of first end point, in meters

parameters.name: Y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of first end point, in meters

parameters.name: Z1
parameters.description: Z coordinate of first end point, in meters

parameters.name: X2
parameters.description: X coordinate of second end point, in meters

parameters.name: Y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of second end point, in meters

parameters.name: Z2
parameters.description: Z coordinate of second end point, in meters

returns: Sketch segment for the center line
remarks:
You can also create centerline construction geometry using
ISketchManager::CreateLine
and
ISketchSegment::ConstructionGeometry
.
